articles.title: Indie critical darling Cairn climbs Steam charts, reaches 200k copies sold on PC and PS5 in first weekend - Eurogamer
articles.description: Mountain-climbing indie game Cairn has already sold over 200,000 copies across PC and PS5, studio The Game Bakers has announced.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms Ground-Breaking Galaxy S26 Ultra Feature - Forbes
articles.description: While we’re waiting for Samsung to announce its next flagship phones, the company has unveiled a killer new feature. Here’s what it is and why it’s so ground-breaking.

articles.title: Ditch app subscriptions with this Microsoft Office lifetime license - Mashable
articles.description: Get Microsoft Office apps for life for less than $5 each.

articles.title: The Top 8 of Pro Tour Lorwyn Eclipsed - MAGIC PLAY
articles.description: An eclectic mix of decks made up the Top 8 of Pro Tour Lorwyn Eclipsed. Follow the action on the way to the finals!

articles.title: Studio Display refresh looms with three key upgrades - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Studio Display shipping times are sliding into late February and early March, adding to mounting signs Apple’s long-rumored refresh is close.
